desc: 何人もの人が身を投げた火山の溶岩が固まったものとされる霊石

dictionary.lore: People who once escaped from their emperor's tyrannical rule, thinking the world was hopeless, leapt together into a volcano. This sinful magical rock is said to be hardened lava from that volcano. Records exist showing magical items being synthesized from it. Scholars surmise that all of this happened in St. Lamia.

name: 蹟業石
